hero.title: Serbian Chamber of Commerce and Industry
hero.subtitle: Supporting Serbian Business Excellence Since 1857

about.title: About PKS
about.whoWeAreText: The Serbian Chamber of Commerce and Industry (PKS) is the largest business association in Serbia, representing the interests of over 70,000 companies across all sectors of the economy.
about.missionText: We support the development of the Serbian economy by providing services to companies, promoting international cooperation, and advocating for a better business environment.
about.networkText: PKS maintains active cooperation with over 200 chambers of commerce worldwide, facilitating international business partnerships and trade opportunities.

services.title: Our Services
services.businessSupportText: Comprehensive assistance for business development, market research, and strategic planning.
services.internationalTradeText: Facilitation of exports, imports, and international business connections.
services.legalServicesText: Expert legal advice, contract verification, and arbitration services.
services.educationTrainingText: Professional development programs, seminars, and business skill workshops.

footer.description: Serbian Chamber of Commerce and Industry

hero.title: Invest in Serbia
hero.subtitle: Discover Exceptional Investment Opportunities in Southeast Europe

intro.title: Why Invest in Serbia?
intro.text: Serbia offers a unique combination of strategic location, skilled workforce, competitive costs, and favorable investment climate, making it an ideal destination for international investors.

advantages.locationText: Located at the crossroads of Europe, Serbia provides excellent access to EU markets and serves as a gateway to the Balkans, with over 800 million consumers within a 1,000 km radius.
advantages.workforceText: Highly educated and multilingual workforce with strong technical skills, competitive labor costs, and a growing IT sector recognized across Europe.
advantages.costsText: Lower operational costs compared to EU countries, including competitive wages, affordable real estate, and reduced overhead expenses.
advantages.zonesText: Modern industrial parks and free zones offering tax incentives, excellent infrastructure, and streamlined administrative procedures.
advantages.economyText: Stable economic growth, manageable public debt, and consistently improving business environment rankings.
advantages.supportText: Comprehensive support from the Serbian government and PKS, including incentives, subsidies, and administrative assistance.

sectors.title: Key Investment Sectors
sectors.automotiveText: Growing automotive sector with major international manufacturers, strong supply chain, and experienced workforce.
sectors.itText: Thriving tech ecosystem, highly skilled software developers, and competitive development costs.
sectors.agricultureText: Rich agricultural tradition, fertile land, and significant export potential in food products.
sectors.energyText: Growing renewable energy sector with opportunities in solar, wind, and hydroelectric power.
sectors.constructionText: Expanding construction market with infrastructure projects and residential development opportunities.
sectors.healthcareText: Established pharmaceutical industry with modern facilities and research capabilities.

cta.title: Ready to Invest?
cta.text: Contact PKS Investment Department for personalized support and guidance throughout your investment journey.

hero.title: Support for Startups
hero.subtitle: Empowering Serbian Entrepreneurs to Build Successful Businesses

intro.title: PKS Startup Ecosystem Support
intro.text: The Serbian Chamber of Commerce and Industry provides comprehensive support for startups and entrepreneurs, helping them navigate the challenges of building and scaling innovative businesses in Serbia.

support.registrationText: Simplified company registration process, legal assistance, and guidance on choosing the right business structure for your startup.
support.mentorshipText: Access to experienced mentors from various industries who provide guidance, advice, and support throughout your startup journey.
support.trainingText: Regular workshops, seminars, and training sessions covering business planning, marketing, finance, and technology topics.
support.networkingText: Connect with other entrepreneurs, investors, and industry leaders through our regular networking events and startup meetups.
support.fundingText: Information about available grants, loans, and investment opportunities, plus connections to angel investors and venture capital funds.
support.coworkingText: Access to affordable office space, meeting rooms, and shared facilities designed for early-stage startups.

programs.title: Startup Programs & Initiatives
programs.hubText: A dedicated space for tech startups with access to modern equipment, high-speed internet, and collaboration areas. The hub hosts regular pitch events and demo days.
programs.exportText: Support for startups looking to expand internationally, including market research assistance, trade mission participation, and export documentation support.
programs.digitalText: Assistance with implementing digital solutions, e-commerce platforms, and online marketing strategies for traditional businesses transitioning to digital.
programs.womenText: Special support program for women-led startups, including dedicated mentorship, funding opportunities, and networking events.

cta.title: Start Your Startup Journey
cta.text: Join the PKS startup community and get the support you need to turn your business idea into reality.
